name: snake101
description:
The "snake101"  coded by me with Pygame library. It is a basic snake game.

Controls:  W - A - S - D   as directions.

  • Red square is snake food and our purpose is eat that square because we are a snake in game. 
  • The snake starts with one black square and when we eat snake food it gain one more black square.
  • The score is number of the food we eat.

          That's it. Enjoy.

    You can download the exexutable file and play snake101.
